summary: This document contains notes from a call on February 4, 2021, between legal personnel, discussing court procedures and communications regarding victims in the Epstein case. It references the court's contact with victims, the sharing of victim counsel information, and the transfer of discovery materials.

persons.name: Deidre von Dornum
persons.context: Participant in the call; discusses court procedures, victim contact, and discovery materials.

persons.name: Christine
persons.context: Mentioned as someone to ask about whether the judge directly contacted Epstein victims.

persons.name: RMB
persons.context: Referred to as a judge who requested victim counsel information and had victim counsel visit him in chambers.

persons.name: DiPietro
persons.context: Mentioned as a potential victim counsel whom the judge might be contacting.

persons.name: Judge Wang
persons.context: Mentioned as a judge before whom the speakers plan to say as little as possible.

connections.description: RMB (judge) may be contacting DiPietro (victim counsel), as speculated in the notes.
Deidre von Dornum considers asking Christine for information about court contact with victims.
RMB requested names and contact info of victim counsel and had them visit in chambers.

events.title: Call Regarding Epstein Case Procedures
events.description: A call took place discussing court contact with Epstein victims, sharing of victim counsel information, and transfer of discovery materials.

events.title: Hard Drive Sent
events.description: Deidre von Dornum sent a hard drive, presumably containing discovery materials, the day before the call.

keyFacts: The court (potentially Judge RMB) has been in contact with Epstein victims, though the exact method (docket posting vs. direct contact) is unclear.
Judge RMB previously requested the names and contact information of victim counsel and had victim counsel visit him in chambers before a nolle conference.
The legal team on the call has not shared victim contact information with the court and plans to say as little as possible before Judge Wang.
A hard drive containing discovery was sent on February 3, 2021, and the team is working on stamping discovery for transfer.
